definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

pinyin: hong2 xi4 bao1 chen2 jiang4 lu:4

sentences.english: Tanggu(Tianjing)is the area of the greatest land subsidence in China nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 天津塘沽区是我国目前年沉降量最大的地区。

sentences.english: Total settlement of composite foundation still decreases with the length of column.
sentences.chinese: 但地基的总体沉降量仍然随桩长增加而线性减小。

sentences.english: Erythrocyte sedimentation rate was slow in perinatal newborn.
sentences.chinese: 而红细胞沉降率显著降低。

sentences.english: So for miscellaneous landfill settlement of the research is essential.
sentences.chinese: 所以对杂填土垃圾填埋场的沉降研究是十分必要的。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the stability behavior of large tapered floating-roof steel storage tanks according to measured settlements.
sentences.chinese: 基于实测沉降数据考察变壁厚浮顶型钢储罐的稳定性。

sentences.english: As a result, research on settlement of miscellaneous filling landfill is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先分析杂填土垃圾填埋场的沉降机理。

sentences.english: The control of settlement difference is a key technology of up-side-down construction adopted for soft soil foundation.
sentences.chinese: 沉降差控制是软土地区逆作法施工中的关键技术。

sentences.english: Usually need to survey deformation of bridge pier in construction process.
sentences.chinese: 在桥梁施工过程中经常需要对桥梁墩台进行沉降观测。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an emptying settling tank of a measuring station for collecting and transporting oil field.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种油田集输的计量站放空沉降罐。

sentences.english: Compensating unit should be provided when wires thread through settlement joint and expansion joint of building.
sentences.chinese: 电气管线穿过建筑物的沉降和伸缩缝采用补偿装置。

sentences.english: These analyses are useful for the design of the inertia separation chamber.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果可为惯性沉降分离室的设计提供参考。

sentences.english: The holding-down and knock-over sinkers (5) do not require dedicated drives and box cams.
sentences.chinese: 退圈和脱圈沉降片不需要配给驱动装置和箱式凸轮。

sentences.english: Differential settlement and wall cracking occured at two resident buildings of Xiantan University.
sentences.chinese: 湘潭大学有两栋住宅楼发生不均匀沉降及墙体开裂。

sentences.english: N deposition can acidify the soil and leaching the exchangeable base cations.
sentences.chinese: 氮沉降能引起土壤酸化，同时造成土壤盐基离子淋失。

sentences.english: The floc formed has better sedimentation property, and easily be separated from water.
sentences.chinese: 并且产生的絮状物沉降性能好，容易从水中分离出来。

sentences.english: Beitang Sag had a feature of episodic subsidence.
sentences.chinese: 北塘凹陷具有幕式沉降的特征。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
